name: presence_change
long_desc: My Slack API Start here App features Messages APIs Slack App Directory Authentication Keep in touch Community A team member's presence changed  				Compatibility:									RTM 											 The presence_change event is sent to all connections for a team when a user changes status. Clients can use this to update their local list of users. If a user updates their presence manually, the manual_presence_change event will also be sent to all connected clients for that user.
